name: Undead Pixels
description:
In this game, you are Simon Whethers. After a nasty shipwreck, you find yourself on a deserted island with nothing but your trusty gun collection. Time to fight off the hordes for as long as you can. Good Luck my friend

With a trusty selection of weapons, You will have to protect Simon for as long as you can and maybe break a record or two.

As the name suggests, this is a pixel-art top-down zombie shooter. 

It features:

Several Levels To Explore.

An endless wave system. 

Several Zombie types and quite a few guns with an ammunition system.

Ammo Pick-Ups.

Rocky Obstacle laced environments.

Epic Blood-Pumping Sound Effects.

How To Play:

Kill any zombie that approaches you. Grab any Ammo Pick Ups you find. Avoid running for too long, otherwise Simon will become exhausted. Survive as long as possible. 

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys -- To Move

Left Mouse Click -- To Shoot (Reload if no ammo in magazine)

R -- To Reload

Shit -- To Run (While Moving)

G -- To Emote

Supported Platforms:

Windows

Thanks for reading and give me feedback if you wish!
